confirmDelegatingToInactive.description: Status of this validator is {{validatorStatus}}. Your delegation might not generate any rewards.
confirmDelegatingToInactive.title: Are you sure you want to continue?

confirmDelegatingToTop.description: This validator is ranked in the top 20 by stake. Please consider delegating to a smaller validator to increase network security and decentralization.

confirmSendingToValidator.description: This is a validator address. Transfers to this address do not stake your funds with the validator.
confirmSendingToValidator.title: Are you sure you want to continue?

sendTransaction.success: Transaction successfully sent. The transaction might take up to a minute to appear on your account.

summary.noWalletIsOpen: To send, receive, stake and swap {{ ticker }} tokens, <HomeLink>open your wallet!</HomeLink>

consensusWithdraw.sent: Received <Amount/> from withdrawal out of {{runtimeName}} ParaTime

createWallet.doNotShare: Never share your keyphrase, anyone with your keyphrase can access your wallet and your tokens.
createWallet.instruction: Save your keyphrase in the right order in a secure location, you will need it to open your wallet.

errors.LedgerOasisAppIsNotOpen: Oasis App on Ledger is closed.
errors.indexerAPIError: {{indexerName}} appears to be down, some information may be missing or out of date. Please, come back later.
errors.ledgerAppVersionNotSupported: Oasis App on Ledger is closed or outdated. Make sure Ledger is unlocked, the Oasis App is opened and up to date.
errors.ledgerCannotOpenOasisApp: Could not open Oasis App on Ledger. Make sure Ledger is unlocked and the Oasis App is opened.
errors.ledgerNoDeviceSelected: No Ledger device selected. Make sure it is connected, <LedgerHelp>check common USB connection issues with Ledger</LedgerHelp>, and <ChromeHelp>check site permissions don't block USB devices</ChromeHelp>.
errors.usbTransportNotSupported: Your browser does not support WebUSB (e.g. Firefox). Try using Chrome.

fatalError.heading: A fatal error occurred
fatalError.instruction: A fatal error has occurred and Oasis Wallet must stop. Try refreshing the page and reopening your wallet to see if the issue persists. If the issue persists, please contact our support team via <Email/> email and attach the report below.

footer.github: Oasis Wallet is fully <GithubLink>open source</GithubLink> - Feedback and issues are appreciated!

poweredBy.oasismonitor: Powered by Oasis Monitor API & Oasis gRPC
poweredBy.oasisscan: Powered by Oasis Scan API & Oasis gRPC

create.description: Create a brand new wallet to send, receive, stake and swap ROSE tokens.

existing.description: Open your existing wallet stored on Ledger, import a private key or a mnemonic phrase.

instructionSteps.closeLedgerLive: Close Ledger Live app on the computer
instructionSteps.confirmPendingReview: Press both buttons on Ledger device to confirm `Pending Ledger review`
instructionSteps.connectLedger: Connect your Ledger device to the computer
instructionSteps.openOasisApp: Open the Oasis App on your Ledger device

bitpie.warning: ‚ùó BitPie wallet users: You cannot import the mnemonic phrase directly from your BitPie wallet. <DocsLink>Check documentation for details.</DocsLink>

openWallet.header: How do you want to open your wallet?

mnemonic.error: Invalid keyphrase. Please make sure to input the words in the right order, all lowercase.
mnemonic.instruction: Enter all your keyphrase words below separated by spaces. Most keyphrases are made of either 24 or 12 words.

privateKey.instruction: Enter your private key in Base64 format.

amount.description: Please enter the amount of {{ticker}} tokens you wish to transfer {{actionType}} wallet on the {{paraTime}} {{paratimeType}} ParaTime and then click "Next"
amount.emptyWallet: The wallet is empty. There is nothing to withdraw.

confirmation.checkboxLabel: I confirm the amount and the address are correct
confirmation.deposit: Please confirm the transferring amount and the receiving wallet's address are correct and then click "Deposit" to make the transfer.
confirmation.description: You are about to transfer {{value}} {{ticker}} tokens {{actionType}} wallet on the {{paraTime}} {{paratimeType}} ParaTime: {{address}}
confirmation.withdraw: Please confirm the withdrawing amount and the withdrawing wallet's address are correct and then click "Withdraw" to make the transfer.

error.description: Transaction failed. We were not able to transfer {{value}} {{ticker}} tokens {{preposition}} the following wallet on the {{paraTime}} {{paratimeType}} ParaTime: {{address}}

recipient.description: Please enter the address of the {{actionType}} wallet on the {{paraTime}} {{paratimeType}} ParaTime and then click "Next"

selection.depositDescription: Please select which ParaTime you wish to transfer your {{ticker}} tokens to and then click "Next".
selection.withdrawDescription: Please select which ParaTime you wish to withdraw your {{ticker}} tokens from and then click "Next".

summary.description: You have successfully transferred {{value}} {{ticker}} tokens {{preposition}} the following wallet on the {{paraTime}} {{paratimeType}} ParaTime: {{address}}

transfers.depositDisabled: You don't have any {{ticker}} tokens to transfer
transfers.description: Use the "Deposit" option to transfer your {{ticker}} tokens from Consensus to a ParaTime of your choosing or "Withdraw" option to transfer your {{ticker}} tokens from a ParaTime back to Consensus.

validation.invalidEthPrivateKeyLength: Private key should be 64 characters long
validation.invalidFee: Value must be integer greater than or equal to 0

preview.warning: Once you confirm this transaction you will not be able to cancel it. Carefully review it, and confirm once you are sure that you want to send it.

types.addEscrow: Delegating your tokens to a validator and generate rewards
types.reclaimEscrow: Reclaiming your tokens delegated to a validator
types.transfer: Transferring tokens from your account to another
